subject: Track and Field
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: John McDonnell, who has been cross-country coach at Arkansas since 1972 and men’s track coach since 1977, will retire in June, after the N.C.A.A. championships.
snippet: John McDonnell, who has been cross-country coach at Arkansas since 1972 and men’s track coach since 1977, will retire in June, after the N.C.A.A. championships.
